review: These are sipping cocktails for sure and will 100% make you forget whatever is bothering you. Cheers to that!
Even though it is low cal, it does not skimp on the booze, and that is worth celebrating for sure
This is what the ready-to-drink cocktail movement is all about. These are solidly high-end cocktail bar worthy drinks that happen to be from a can.
I almost cried I loved it so much. And then I did cry when my drink was empty!
If you like sweet, dessert cocktails or chai lattes, don't miss this cocktail!!
I honestly feel like the Cliff's drink is the perfect addition to a party.
YESSSS! All the yes for this one!
These are sipping cocktails for sure and will 100% make you forget whatever is bothering you. Cheers to that!
This was a surprisingly good drink! Very refreshing.
I love the tart flavor in this drink!. They are spicy, but perfect. Two thumbs up for sure!
